Output

contains

    function compute_first(pos) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: pos

        integer(8) :: res, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex

        nrstSeqStartIndx =1

        do while (getValueAtIndex(2*nrstSeqStartIndx) < pos)

            nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2

        end do

        do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= pos)

            nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1

        end do

        startIndex = getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx)

        res = (pos - startIndex) +1

    end function

    function getValueAtIndex(index) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: index

        integer(8) :: res

        res = 1 + (index-1)*index /2

    end function

    function compute_second(first_val) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: first_val

        integer :: res, digits(20), count=0, i, r, transformed, newNumber=0, pow=0

        integer(8) :: temp = first_val

        count =0

        do while (temp >0)

            count = count +1

            digits(count) = mod(temp,10)

            temp = temp /10

        end do

        newNumber =0

        pow =0

        do i=1, count

            r = digits(i) if (9 - r < r) then

                if (i == count .and. (9 - r ==0)) then

                    transformed = r

                else

                    transformed =9 -r

                end if

            else

                transformed =r

            end if

            newNumber = newNumber + transformed * 10**pow

            pow = pow +1

        end do

        res = newNumber

    end function

    function compute_third(n) result(res)

        integer, intent(in) :: n

        integer :: res

        res = (n /3)*2 + (mod(n,3) /=0 )

    end function

end program main

program main

    implicit none

    integer(8) :: position, first_result

    integer :: second_result, third_result

    ! Read input

    read(*,*) position

    ! Compute first_result

    first_result = compute_first(position)

    ! Compute second_result

    second_result = compute_second(first_result)

    ! Compute third_result

    third_result = compute_third(second_result)

    ! Output

    print*, third_result

contains

    function compute_first(pos) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: pos

        integer(8) :: res, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex

        nrstSeqStartIndx =1

        do while (getValueAtIndex(2*nrstSeqStartIndx) < pos)

            nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2

        end do

        do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= pos)

            nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1

        end do

        startIndex = getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx)

        res = (pos - startIndex) +1

    end function

    function getValueAtIndex(index) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: index

        integer(8) :: res

        res = 1 + (index-1)*index /2

    end function

    function compute_second(first_val) result(res)

        integer(8), intent(in) :: first_val

        integer :: res, digits(20), count=0, i, r, transformed, newNumber=0, pow=0

        integer(8) :: temp = first_val

        count =0

        do while (temp >0)

            count = count +1

            digits(count) = mod(temp,10)

            temp = temp /10

        end do

        newNumber =0

        pow =0

        do i=1, count

            r = digits(i)

            if (9 - r < r) then

                if (i == count .and. (9 - r ==0)) then

                    transformed = r

                else

                    transformed =9 -r

                end if

            else

                transformed =r

            end if

            newNumber = newNumber + transformed * 10**pow

            pow = pow +1

        end do

        res = newNumber

    end function

    function compute_third(n) result(res)

        integer, intent(in) :: n

        integer :: res

        res = (n /3)*2 + (mod(n,3) /=0 )

    end function

end program main
